svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 25px; margin-left: 21px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(212, 230, 241), rgb(29, 45, 54)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(52, 152, 219), rgb(48, 134, 191));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 130px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
步骤1：特征增强
原始特征 + 一阶差分 + 二阶差分
+ 多尺度滑动窗口 (3,5,12,24)

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(212, 230, 241), rgb(29, 45, 54)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(52, 152, 219), rgb(48, 134, 191));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 130px; margin-left: 241px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
步骤2：异常检测
IsolationForest (无监督)
自动调优 contamination 参数

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(212, 230, 241), rgb(29, 45, 54)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(52, 152, 219), rgb(48, 134, 191));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 130px; margin-left: 481px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
步骤3：伪标签生成
动态阈值 (百分位数)
基于目标事件率

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(212, 230, 241), rgb(29, 45, 54)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(52, 152, 219), rgb(48, 134, 191));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 250px; margin-left: 481px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
步骤4：概率校准
ExtraTrees (n=100)
+ Platt Scaling

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(212, 230, 241), rgb(29, 45, 54)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(52, 152, 219), rgb(48, 134, 191));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 250px; margin-left: 241px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
步骤5：序列数据构建
历史窗口24步
高斯噪声增强
train/val/test划分

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(212, 230, 241), rgb(29, 45, 54)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(52, 152, 219), rgb(48, 134, 191));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 250px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
步骤6：数据集保存
CSV格式
train_data.csv
val_data.csv
test_data.csv

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(52, 73, 94), rgb(161, 179, 197)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(52, 73, 94), rgb(161, 179, 197));
fill: light-dark(rgb(52, 73, 94), rgb(161, 179, 197)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(52, 73, 94), rgb(161, 179, 197));
fill: light-dark(rgb(52, 73, 94), rgb(161, 179, 197)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(52, 73, 94), rgb(161, 179, 197));
fill: light-dark(rgb(52, 73, 94), rgb(161, 179, 197)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(52, 73, 94), rgb(161, 179, 197));
fill: light-dark(rgb(52, 73, 94), rgb(161, 179, 197)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(52, 73, 94), rgb(161, 179, 197));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
